All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
EventServiceClient
Feign client interface for interacting with the Event Service.
EventServiceClient.EventServiceFallback
Fallback class for the EventServiceClient interface
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler which imports all common exceptions and further handles service specific exceptions
InterServiceCommunicationController
Controller for the communication of other microservices
InventoryController
Controller for handling inventory related requests
InventoryRepository
Repository interface for Item entity.
InventorySecurityService
Service class for inventory security
InventoryService
Service class for inventory operations
InventoryServiceApplication
Main application class for the inventory service
Item
Entity class for items in inventory
ItemCreateDto
Dto class for creating items
ItemDetailsDto
Dto class for item details
ItemNotFoundException
Exception class for handling items that are not found
ItemOrderDto
Dto class for items in orders
ModelMapperConfig
Model mapper for mapping entities and dtos
OutOfStockException
Exception class for handling items that are out of stock
SecurityConfig
Security configuration class for JWT based Spring Security application
